sense.gloss: difference, disagreement, conflict, clash, discrepancy, inconsistency

sdata.j: ２↑人↑↓にん↓の↑意見↑↓いけん↓には↑大↑↓おお↓きな|↑食↑↓く↓い↑違↑↓ちが↓い|があった。
sdata.e: There was a great gap between the views of the two.

sdata.j: ↑親↑↓おや↓とよく↑意見↑↓いけん↓が|↑食↑↓く↓い↑違↑↓ちが↓い|ます。
sdata.e: My parents and I disagree on a lot of things.
